sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: This Privacy Policy outlines the practices regarding the collection, usage, and sharing of your information through the website and related services provided by Opal x Terminus, accessible at https://opalxterminus.com.

sections.title: 2. Information We Collect
content: Personal Data: Your username, email address, IP address, user agent, and payment information if you purchased an Opal service directly.
Non-Personal Data: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website.

sections.title: 3. Purpose of Data Collection
sections.content: The primary purpose of collecting personal data is for user identification and authentication. This ensures that we can securely grant you to access and utilize our services.

sections.title: 4. Data Sharing
sections.content: By nature, we may share your information with third-party service providers that we use to operate Opal, such as payment processors and email service providers. We may also share your information with other developers of Opal if you are granted access to said software. We do not share, sell, rent, or trade your personal information with any other third parties.

sections.title: 5. Security of Personal Information
sections.content: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to a court order or subpoena. We may also disclose your information to investigate or prevent fraud, or to protect the rights, property, or safety of Opal, our developers, or others.

sections.title: 6. Data Retention
sections.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide the services you have requested, or for other essential purposes such as complying with legal obligations, resolving disputes, and enforcing our policies. If you wish to delete your account, please contact us using the support email listed below.

sections.title: 7. Children's Privacy
sections.content: We are committed to protecting the privacy of children. We do not knowingly collect or solicit personal information from anyone under the age of 13. If you are under 13, please do not attempt to use Opal or send any personal information about yourself to us.

sections.title: 8. Modifications to this Policy
sections.content: From time to time, we may update this Privacy Policy with or without notice. We encourage you to periodically review this policy to stay informed about your information.

sections.title: 9. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, or if you want to exercise any of your rights related to your personal data, feel free to contact us at support@mail.opalxterminus.com. We will do our best to respond at our earliest convenience.
